Detailed Description

Representation of the declaration of a single variable.

In conjunction with an instance of the DeclSpecs, this gives us everything we need for a full variable declaration.

Definition at line 121 of file decl.h.

Member Function Documentation

void Declarator::AddArrayDimension ( int  size )

As the parser peels off array dimension declarations after the symbol name, it calls this method to provide them to the Declarator.
